quote: Situated on the NC/TN border, Hot Springs has one flat road along the French Broad River, everything else is climbing on some amazing scenic roads.
Both the short and long courses were shorter than average for this series
Don't just ride your bike and leave town. Stick around on Saturday for some more camping, food, and hang out... Plan on spending the weekend in Hot Springs with your whole family.
Hot Springs has a tiny and vibrant downtown. With restaurants and breweries, people come for the weekend or stop as they're thru hiking the Appalachian Trail.
